pages.text: Elephants are neutral creatures that spawns in herds.$(br2)Elephants can be tamed with Acacia Blossoms, but only non-tusker adults can be tamed. However, baby Tusker Elephants can be tamed.$(br2)Elephants can be attracted with Acacia Blossom.$(br2)Elephants are scared of Bees.
Tamed Elephants will defend their owner but they will not follow them.
They can be equipped with Carpets.$(br2)They can be equipped with chests for a large, 9x6 storage space.$(br2)Elephants can be ridden, like other mounts, by right-clicking on them.
